InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S2 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 2

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 2

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-212 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 1xS2

Behring’s MSD-212 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S2 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Tempest II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The Tempest was designed with nothing but annihilation in mind. Utilizing FireStorm Kinetics' targeting technology, this proximity missile locks onto a target's cross section to draw conflicts to a swift conclusion.

InstalledItem.Name: HEX
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

Prepare your ship for any circumstance by installing a HEX from Seal Corporation. Balanced performance and durability make this an ideal, versatile choice for those who don’t know where their next adventure may take them.

InstalledItem.Name: ExoGen
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co. 
Size: 2
Grade: D
Class: Military

Simple and direct, the ExoGen generates power in traditional A&R style: no fuss, just solid craftsmanship.

InstalledItem.Name: Boreal
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: D
Class: Military

Designed to disperse the heat of battle, Aegis Dynamics’ Boreal cooler is a military standard with the capacity to survive stressful situations.

InstalledItem.Name: FoxFire
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Ace Astrogation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Competition

The FoxFire won't leave a burning trail in your wake, but this quantum drive’s strong performance leaves an equal impression. Making it another elegant and powerful component from the folks at Ace Astrogation.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.
